function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underestimation of ecosystemic services in urban design and environmental management","Impact":"Diminished physical and mental health of city dwellers, increased risk of contamination and flooding","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and education about the importance of UGSs, integrate ecosystemic services into urban planning","Technologies":"GIS mapping, urban modeling software, environmental impact assessment tools","People":"City planners, urban designers, environmental managers","Owner":"City government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Shift in the use of UGSs as places for shelter, amusement, and social gathering due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, overuse of UGSs, potential overcrowding, and lack of social distancing","Mitigation":"Implement guidelines for safe use of UGSs during pandemic, promote alternative outdoor spaces, educate the public on responsible outdoor activities","Technologies":"Mobile applications for monitoring crowd density, virtual mapping for alternative outdoor spaces, communication tools for public education","People":"City residents, visitors, local authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities"},{"Description":"Notable increase in the use of nature-related cell-phone applications, such as birdwatching apps","Impact":"Potential overcrowding in certain UGSs, lack of social distancing, increased environmental impact, disruption of natural habitats","Mitigation":"Promote responsible use of nature-related apps, encourage diversity of outdoor activities, support conservation efforts in high-traffic UGSs","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring apps, geofencing for restricted areas, conservation and habitat protection technologies","People":"Users of nature-related apps, UGS visitors, conservation organizations","Owner":"Nature app developers, conservation organizations"}]}
